thread.title: Ideal location for a London trip
thread.title_full: Ideal location for a London trip - Review of Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CallieB808
title: Ideal location for a London trip
text: We stayed here on a recent weekend visit to London - easy to get to with ample parking, perfect location for catching the Tube into the city centre. Friendly, helpful staff - we received a complimentary bottle of wine and some balloons in our room when the receptionist, Linda discovered it was my partner's birthday - a very nice, thoughtful touch! The rooms were quiet and well sound proofed, clean and spacious, lovely breakfasts... can't fault it and will definitely be using again!
